Description: Ostracon, fragment (two pieces joined) of the body of a light-brown pottery wine-jar, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text identifying the contents as year 9 wine of the Aten.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393473) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393473)
